p: Figure 5a illustrates the positions of crystallographic axes in the HRTEM pattern. Red dots correspond to the two extra atomic rows. Figure 5b schematically represents the dislocation region, including the position of the two edge dislocations generated by extra atomic planes. Deformation analysis of elementary cells relies on the idealization of a 3-D atomic array formed by superposing identical 2-D atomic arrays stacked in the vertical direction. Since this stack may change over depth because of the sequence shown in Figure 1 based in the covalent bonding of Si and C atoms, the present analysis is limited to the 2-D array.
